quotes.quote: Whatever you think you can do or believe you can do, begin it! Action has magic, grace and power in it!
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: The position of the artist is humble. He is essentially a channel.
quotes.author: Piet Mondrian

quotes.quote: Poetry often enters through the window of irrelevance.
quotes.author: M. C. Richards

quotes.quote: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters, compared to what lies within us.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
